name: ColorCatcher
description:
This is a funny and a simple game where you have to catch your respective color, and if you catch other colors, you may have a problem with your vision in the game.

You can Shoot by clicking the mouse and also, you can clean the screen after a time.

When you catch a ball of your collor it will restore 3 seconds, if you shoot, each shoot will restore 5 seconds.

when you grown up, you will be more slow.
